snippet.title: Welcome to Elk, release date announcement!
snippet.description:
We have been working on Welcome to Elk for more than two years! And now we have a release day to share with you! 🎉

******September 17th 2020******
👉Xbox : https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/p/welcome-to-elk/9np4zd9b59x9
👉Steam; Pc and Mac
💌 Wish-list us on Steam:  https://store.steampowered.com/app/1015940/Welcome_to_Elk/

Welcome to Elk is a biographical adventure set on an island like no other, where every character you encounter has a story to tell. From the weird and wonderful to the dark and desperate, all the tales told on Elk are based on true stories of life on the road less traveled.

Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/q3nNqkg
Webpage: https://www.welcometoelk.com/

Triple Topping Games
